name: SCRIMP
paper: Matrix Profile XI: SCRIMP++: Time Series Motif Discovery at Interactive Speeds. in ICDM
description: SCRIMP is an incremental algorithm to compute matrix profile efficiently, offering fast approximate results useful in interactive settings.
